resources.string: Sharon Dsouza is a graduate student pursuing her Masters in Computer Science at Pace university in New York.\n\n She is an aspiring software developer with previous work experience in the field of software development, working on projects for clients in the Education Tech industry over the span of a year. She has collaborated in a team of 3 to design and implement APIs for web and mobile applications. Her experience allowed her gain hands on experience with Python Django frameworks and Database design and management - to name a few. In addition to software development she was entrusted with maintaining client relations to gather project requirements and scope, as well as build Software Requirements Specification (SRS) Document. In addition to the experiences highlighted above, she also has experience working in teams outside of the classroom for various College Events namely in the Logistics, Marketing and Management (as General Secretary) position. She is passionate about building software for the multicultural world we live in today.
I love to read, paint and watch sports in my free time!
